articles.title: Anna Netrebko: Top Russian soprano fired over war sues Met Opera - BBC
articles.description: Anna Netrebko was dropped by the Met Opera last year after refusing to denounce Russia's president.
articles.content:
Russian opera singer Anna Netrebko is suing New York City's Metropolitan Opera, after she was dropped following Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
